actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-647.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-643.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing as a House document the booklet entitled "The Supreme Court of the United States".

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that there shall be printed as a House document with illustrations, the booklet entitled "The Supreme Court of the United States"; and that ninety-eight thousand four hundred additional copies shall be printed of which eighty-eight thousand four hundred shall be for the use of the House of Representatives and ten thousand copies shall be for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing. Provides that there shall be printed for the use of the Senate ten thousand three hundred additional copies of the document authorized by this concurrent resolution.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing as a House document the booklet entitled "The Supreme Court of the United States".
